content:
TITLE: Running Changeset Command for Version Tracking in Radix UI Primitives
DESCRIPTION: This command is used to mark appropriate types of changes for packages, which is later consumed when publishing new versions. The generated files should be checked in along with code changes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/radix-ui/primitives/blob/main/release-process.md#2025-04-11_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm changeset
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the SSR Development Server for Radix UI Primitives
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server for testing server-side rendering support in Radix UI primitives. This command should be run from the root of the repository.
SOURCE: https://github.com/radix-ui/primitives/blob/main/apps/ssr-testing/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
pnpm dev:ssr
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Linking to Radix UI Form Component Documentation in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: This snippet provides a markdown link to the documentation for the Radix UI Form component. It uses the standard markdown link syntax to direct users to the component's documentation page.
SOURCE: https://github.com/radix-ui/primitives/blob/main/packages/react/form/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
# `react-form`

View docs [here](https://radix-ui.com/primitives/docs/components/form).
```
